successes.title: BI V2.0 - A self-replicating, high precision 3D Printer
successes.description: We have around 15 V2.5 units available on a summer discount. Get yours now for only 999$. Use coupon: summersale.

Pledges.description: Thanks for contributing to the development of the BI V2.0 3D Printer and helping us offer more for less! We will 3D print the name of every backer of the BI V2.0 and create an awesome artistic mural in our office space. We will include your name in the backer's mural to immortalize your support!
Receive a premium heavyweight t-shirt with an artistic rendition including our logo. We will be working with a local artist to make sure it's an awesome design. USA/CAN ONLY. Add 15$ for shipping.
Receive a decorative 200 mm high 3D printed vase in your choice of five Super Premium PLA colors. USA/CAN ONLY. Add 15$ for shipping.

Receive one of our redesigned high performance BI Edition hot end. Ships with a push to connect fitting, thermistor and heat cartridge installed. Add 15$ for USA/CAN shipping. See FAQ for INT'L shipping.
Receive all the BI V2.0 3D printed parts. Add your own components to create your own version of the BI V2.0! Add 20$ for USA/CAN shipping. See FAQ for INT'L shipping.

HIGHLY LIMITED EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - Receive the BI V2.0 3D Printer. Complete with heat bed, LCD controller and Auto-level probe.
Add 60$ for USA/CAN shipping. See FAQ for INT'L shipping.

LIMITED EARLY BIRD SPECIAL. Your support is greatly appreciated! Receive the BI V2.0 3D Printer. Complete with heat bed, LCD controller and Auto-level probe. Add 60$ for USA/CAN shipping. See FAQ for INT'L shipping.
EARLY ADOPTER SPECIAL - Get your BI V2.0 3D Printer at a bargain price! Complete with heat bed, LCD controller and Auto-level probe. Add 60$ for USA/CAN shipping. See FAQ for INT'L shipping.
EARLY ADOPTER SPECIAL - Get your BI V2.0 3D Printer at a bargain price! Complete with heat bed, LCD controller and Auto-level probe. Add 60$ for USA/CAN shipping. See FAQ for INT'L shipping.
EARLY ADOPTER SPECIAL - Get your BI V2.0 3D Printer at a bargain price! Complete with heat bed, LCD controller and Auto-level probe. Add 60$ for USA/CAN shipping. See FAQ for INT'L shipping.
EARLY ADOPTER SPECIAL - Get your BI V2.0 3D Printer at a bargain price! Complete with heat bed, LCD controller and Auto-level probe. Add 60$ for USA/CAN shipping. See FAQ for INT'L shipping.

The BI V2.0 is set to retail at 799$ once the Kickstarter is over. Hurry up and grab yours at 699$  (around 655$ USD) for the duration of the Kickstarter campaign! You'll also be the first one to receive it.

BI V2.0 3D Printer Special Blue Edition - Shipping Fully Assembled - Complete with heat bed, LCD controller and Auto-level probe. Includes 2 hours of personalized training on designing 3D parts and operating your BI V2.0 optimally. USA/CAN shipping included (In a massive box!). See FAQ for INT'L shipping.
